page.title: 05Farming
page.content: Considering most of the land on our patch is farmland ( the rest being forest and village) there are many farms.They tend to be rather small and quite similar.Much of the land is grazing pasture for cows and sheep. The crops grown are mainly barley and wheat with a few turnips and potato fields.Grass is grown for winter feeding. There are eight farms on our patch they are Blinkbonny Farm, Newlandburn Farm, Mountskip Farm,Wright's Houses,Loquhariot, Borthwick Mains, Hagbrae and Crichton Mains. Rather than write a little about each farm we have decided to highligt one;Newlandburn Farm.We visited both farms and this is what we discovered.(continued on page 6)
